sentences.en: A description of plasma instabilities in a systematic way is nontrivial.
sentences.cn: 用系统的方法讲述等离子体不稳定性并不是容易的.

sentences.en: A plasma is a quasineutral gas of charged and neutral particles which exhibits collective behavior.
sentences.cn: 等离子体是带电粒子和中性粒子组成的表现出集体行为的一种准中性气体.

sentences.en: Adequate quantities of plasma continued to perfuse the kidney.
sentences.cn: 相当量的血浆持续灌注到肾脏.

sentences.en: Blood cells like red blood cells float in the plasma.
sentences.cn: 血细胞就是像在血浆里漂浮的红色血细胞.

sentences.en: Detailed analysis of complex lipids emphasizes the dissimilarity between the composition of lysosomal and plasma memebranes.
sentences.cn: 复合磷脂的详细分析明显地表明了溶酶体膜与质膜的不同.

sentences.en: Encouraging results have also been obtained with the anodic plasma - oxidation technique for nonrecessed oxides.
sentences.cn: 对于无凹槽氧化物层,采用阳极等离子体氧化技术也已获得了鼓舞人心的结果.

sentences.en: He is very interested in plasma physics.
sentences.cn: 他对等离子体物理学很感兴趣.

sentences.en: If the electrical conductivity is high enough the field becomes " frozen " into the plasma.
sentences.cn: 如果电导率足够高,磁场就 “ 冻结 ” 在等离子中.

sentences.en: It receives only in lymph, it gives the emotion through the blood and the right current, what you call, through the nerve system, and it changes to be the same plasma the skin of the man or your nail.
sentences.cn: 它只会在淋巴中接收，而通过血液和合适的电流来给予情感，也就是通过你们所说的神经系统，然后它就变成与你的皮肤或者指甲相同的等离子体。

sentences.en: Keep some blood plasma back for the serious cases.
Now there are no gaps, so this is the state of matter, and this was the state of a plasma.
sentences.cn: 现在没有任何间隙，这样这是物质的状态，而以前是一个等离子体状态。

sentences.en: Plasma - polymerization of ethylene gives films of complex, uncertain structure.
sentences.cn: 乙烯的等离子聚合得到复杂的, 无固定结构的薄膜.

sentences.en: Plasma in space are collision free.
sentences.cn: 空间中等离子体是无碰撞的.

sentences.en: Plasma membranes of different cells make contact in all directions but there are no intercalated discs.
sentences.cn: 各型细胞的浆膜在各方面上都有接触,但无润盘.

sentences.en: Scientists think this plasma represents the state of the whole universe justmoments after it was born in the Big Bang, when the universe was extremely hotand dense.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为这种等离子体代表整个宇宙在它出生的大爆炸之后瞬间的状态，那时的宇宙是非常炎热和致密的。

sentences.en: The albumin fraction of plasma protein is of the greatest significance.
sentences.cn: 血浆蛋白的白蛋白部分意义最大.

sentences.en: The plasma is the liquid portion of blood that is free of cells .
sentences.cn: 血浆是血液的液体部分，不包含各种细胞。

sentences.en: The vascular changes interfere with diffusion of nutrients from plasma into adjacent perivascular tissue and cells.
sentences.cn: 这些血管变化干扰了营养物质从血浆中向血管周围邻接的组织和细胞扩散.

sentences.en: When a drug permeates a cell, it must obviously traverse the cellular plasma membrane.
sentences.cn: 当药物透过细胞时, 它显然必定要穿过胞浆膜.
